tharusha weragoda 32 (tharindu liyanage 22/4,)kingswud palamu inima – 121 tharindu liyanage 39, kasun bandara nodawi 30 ( deneth lanka 21/4, )moratu widuhalath, panadura shri sumangala widuhalath athara warshikawa pawathwena 61wani maha krikat tharagaya jaya parajayen thorawa moratuwa tiron pranandu kridanganayedi nimawata pathwiya.moratu widuhala kadulu 8kata lakunu 210k laba thibiyadi panduwata muhunadime waraya shri sumangala widuhalata labadun athara owun lakunu 150k raskara gathha.pilithuru inima krida kala moratu widuhala kadulu 7kata lakunu 113k labagath athara jayagrahanaya sandaha lakunu 171ka ilakkayak hambaagiya sumangala widuhala tharagaya nathara karanawita kadulu 2kata lakunu 74k labagaththeya.
